full_text: “Arracht” is a tough but beautiful watch which takes viewers right to the dark heart of events that defined the history of the British Isles https://t.co/waplTJ7zHe

localize.full_text: "Arracht "は、イギリス諸島の歴史を決定づけた出来事の暗い核心に迫る、厳しくも美しい時計です。https://t.co/waplTJ7zHe
